item.title: Donkey Kong
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

You’re still a fucking retard Full Metalst. Your work is shit, and your opinion doesn’t matter, unlike any one of us here.

Full Metalst:

[quote=Cruzer]your stuff is shit as fastbawlz said before you dont need more then one thread. especially for shit. shit.

Yeah well you’re shit and you’re worth shit now get the fuck off my topic. Reported fucker. Get the fuck off you’re worth nothing here… I wouldn’t post a gallery and then modify it everyday fucking retard. That would take way too much work since I make 4 sigs a day because I actually put work into my sigs and I’m actually learning while you’re just taking the easy road. (Dayum that was a long run-on sentence)

the bank - stop being so hypocritical and irrelevant and you get off too if you don’t like my work then don’t fucking bother posting. I’ve had enough of mopars’ members’ shit mute me ban me idfc you guys just don’t care what I work on and you don’t appreciate the hard work I put into a sig. You can report me back but that only shows that you’re a pussy and you can’t handle the truth.[/quote]

Way to have an incoherent, and irrelevant argument. All that hard work you put into your signatures is wasted. Just like your posts. [b]Mute you? Ban you? Makes absolutely zero sense. For one thing regular members cannot mute or ban. Second, if you were banned you wouldn’t be here right now, unless you’re ban evading. Way to incriminate yourself faggot.

Unless that’s not what you mean, and because your grammar is complete shit I don’t really understand what you’re saying. But I like the former, mainly because that comes with the possibility of you getting banned.[/b]

Read full topic
